name: Fighting Street
description:
A port of the arcade version of “STREET FIGHTER”, the legendary fighting game that started it all. Players control RYU or KEN and battle against unique fighters from all over the world. The first fighter to knock out their opponent and win two rounds is the winner. Power up your attack to three different levels—the longer you hold a button, the stronger your attack. Input commands to perform special attacks and deal serious damage to your opponent! Combine your normal and special attacks effectively to fight your way to victory!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
